a.n: Yaniss Odua & Artikal Band at Elysée

p.k: Yaniss Odua & Artikal Band at Elysée Montmartre 2017. Yaniss Odua & Artikal Band. Paris, France
p.d: Without succumbing to the fashion of the moment, Yaniss Odua manages to reconcile trends and modernize reggae, incorporating hip-hop in some of his songs, and accelerating rocksteady. Since the late 1990s, this singer from Martinique champions reggae music with his persuasive voice, making audiences reflect and dance. Yaniss Odua recorded his debut album Little Yaniss when he was only 13. In 2002, he had the great honour of singing on Tiken Jah Fakoly's album Françafrique. This show features a performance with his band Artikal at the Elysée Montmartre in Paris.
